<<<<<<< HEAD
Apollo Christian: or Helicon reformed
[6], 42 p. : ill.
Printed [at Eliot's Court Press] for Thomas Norton, and are to bee sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Kings-head, London : 1617.
Mostly in verse. Identification of printer from STC. Running title reads: Helicon reformed. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======
